body_html:
Oh, cool I was not aware of the ._make method. I agree what you are proposing is better.

So to not duplicate code a is_namedtuple function should be created, where to define it - in torch/utils/__init__.py ?

body:
Oh, cool I was not aware of the `._make` method. I agree what you are proposing is better. 

So to not duplicate code a `is_namedtuple` function should be created, where to define it - in `torch/utils/__init__.py` ?
